message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. I'm willing to pay that amount for the product.
I understand your offer, Bob, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product for $105.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I can offer $95 for the product.
I understand your budget constraints, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer the product to you for $100. This is my final offer.
